item.title: test post
item.description:
This is a sample blog post written in Markdown.

Features

  • Simple and fast
  • Markdown support
  • Clean design

You can write your blog posts in Markdown and they will be automatically converted to HTML!

The images will be:

  • Automatically resized to fit the content width
  • Properly styled with rounded corners and subtle shadows
  • Responsive on all devices
  • Optimized for both light and dark modes

Let me know if you need any clarification or have questions about using images in your blog posts!
